translation.Select the language you want to use in t: Select the language you want to use in the app

translation.Name: Name
translation.I post orders and look for performers fo: I post orders and look for performers for my orders
translation.I respond to orders and perform them: I respond to orders and perform them
translation.I help customers manage their projects a: I help customers manage their projects and connect them with performers
translation.Think up and generate your boldest ideas: Think up and generate your boldest ideas with artificial intelligence

translation.All performers have a license to conduct: All performers have a license to conduct work. We carefully control the process
translation.Are you a builder, designer or cleaning: Are you a builder, designer or cleaning company?

translation.Increase your rating and get reviews: Increase your rating and get reviews
translation.This will allow you to be a sought-after: This will allow you to be a sought-after specialist in the market and take on large orders
translation.Specify how much your service costs and: Specify how much your service costs and the platform will automatically calculate the cost of work for the customer
translation.Allow the app to use the following phone: Allow the app to use the following phone functions:
translation.This app needs camera access to take pho: This app needs camera access to take photos for your orders
translation.This app needs location access to show y: This app needs location access to show you relevant nearby orders

translation.All permissions granted! You can now use: All permissions granted! You can now use all app features.
translation.Some permissions were granted. You can c: Some permissions were granted. You can change them later in device settings.
translation.No permissions were granted. You can ena: No permissions were granted. You can enable them later in device settings for full functionality.
translation.Permissions will be requested when you f: Permissions will be requested when you first use each feature. You can manage them later in Settings > Buildify.
translation.Something went wrong while requesting pe: Something went wrong while requesting permissions. Please try again.
translation.Manage projects, connect customers with: Manage projects, connect customers with performers, and moderate orders

translation.Professional platform for construction s: Professional platform for construction services in Dubai
translation.Buildlify is a comprehensive platform th: Buildlify is a comprehensive platform that connects customers with verified construction professionals in Dubai. Our app provides AI-powered interior design generation, secure payment processing, and quality assurance for all construction projects.
translation.For support and inquiries, please contac: For support and inquiries, please contact us through the Technical Support section in the app menu.
translation.Date must be in DD.MM.YYYY format: Date must be in DD.MM.YYYY format

translation.You have reached your response limit for: You have reached your response limit for the current subscription period. Upgrade your plan to respond to more orders.
